QuestData.Title: Not In Your Army
QuestData.Description: Your men caught one of da new recruits, talking with da alliance behind your back. She be a traitor, boss-mon! She be a danger to everything you've worked so hard for.$B$BWe have a wyvern ready to be takin' her to your garrison for proper punishment. I thought you would be wantin' to deal with da scoundrel personally.$B$BI last be seein' her on the back road out of Axefall.
